stanza.line: For shame deny that thou bear love to anyany

But that thou none lov is most evidentevident

That gainst thy self thou stick not to conspireconspire
Seeking that beauteous roof to ruinateruinate
Which to repair should be thy chief desiredesire
O change thy thought that I may change my mindmind
Shall hate be fairer lodged than gentle lovelove
Be as thy presence is gracious and kindkind

Make thee another self for love of meme
